title: Tough, Vol. 3
description: "Nobody enjoys a good fight more than "Kiibo" Miyazawa, a high school student whose father is training him in a secret martial arts form passed down from generation to generation. Kiibo just may have the awesome fighting skills to be the next Bruce Lee, but for now he's stuck going to school and doing his chores..."--P. [4] of cover.
author: Tetsuya Saruwatari
